attributes.action: Release prisoner of a good character.
attributes.additional_details: Prisons have every kind of people and in that who are nice and mistakenly ended their could be under wrong influence. I urgely request parliament to save the innocence and guide them law. Atleast give them chance.
attributes.background: In covid situation prisoners are locked for 23 hours in prisons and one hour for a walk which leads them into severe breakdown its very bad for person of a good character. Prison influence is bad. Please release them with rehabilitation process.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Prisoners Early Release due to new Covid-19 Strain: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567457

Early release for all prisoners who have been locked up through covid: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550490
